Title: Provides additional support to children with complex needs under the jurisdiction of the state
Summary: Provides additional support to children with complex needs under the jurisdiction of the state; requires data collection regarding children under the jurisdiction of the state; provides additional funding to the council on children and families.
LawCode: Amd §§483-b & 483-d, Soc Serv L; amd §99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the state finance law, in relation to providing additional support to children with complex needs under the jurisdiction of the state
